text:
Initially wanted to try the Rendang Beef Nasi Bamboo but unfortunately it was sold out close to 6pm that day. Opted take-away for the rusuk(rib) instead.

The rice was wrapped using pandan leaf, which led to every grain of rice being really fragrant & rich in flavour. There were no clumps at all. The rib was succulent, well-cooked & it literally peeled off the bone effortlessly. The piece of fat was a bonus at it enhances the taste of the meal without overpowering it.

The rendang gravy was slightly underwhelming for my taste however it still went well with the rice & meat.

For take-away, the dish was further wrapped using aluminium foil which kept the dish warm till you get home.

The uncle manning the store was extremely friendly too!

It was basmati rice for the nasi lemak and surprise was freshly fry big omelette n freshly hot chicken wing. Ikan bilis and peanuts are fresh n not like those  mass produce. No wonder they took a little longer to prepare. Next time I will try ikan nasi lemak.
I love the taste and the texture of the rice. Anyway, the food tasted delicious. It's Halal certified. The staff is helpful. Highly recommended!
Seasoned meat with Basmati rice wrap in Phrynium leaves (ÊüäÂè∂) and cook inside bamboo, rice is Light, fluffy and fragrant, but meat (chicken) a bit dry up, overall still good

Sure thing!

If you're on the hunt for a delightful dining experience that caters to the whole family, look no further than Bamboo Nasi Rendang! This gem of a spot serves up mouthwatering rendang that's bursting with rich, savoury flavors and tender goodness. The atmosphere is warm and welcoming, making it perfect for family gatherings or casual meals with friends. Plus, their menu has something for everyone ‚Äì even the pickiest eaters will find something to love!
